mapper.insert: insert into cart ( cartid, memberId, productsId, productsName, productsIMG, productsPrice ) values ( cart_id_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{productsId}, #{productsName}, #{productsIMG}, #{productsPrice} )

insert into cart (cartid, memberId, productsId, productsName, productsIMG, productsPrice, reservation, purchasetime, endtime) values ( cart_id_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{productsId}, #{productsName}, #{productsIMG}, #{productsPrice}, #{reservation}, to_date(#{purchasetime}, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:SS'), to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:SS') )
mapper.select: select * from cart where memberId = #{memberid} ORDER BY ROWNUM desc
